summary: Frontend testing completed for Phase 2 Report Builder features: Live Data Binding and Sparklines in Tables. All 8 requested features verified and working correctly.

issues: Console warning: 'Missing Description or aria-describedby' for DialogContent - minor accessibility issue

frontend: Report Builder page loads correctly with all sections at /report-builder
Data binding button (Database icon) visible on bar_chart section (bind-data-1)
Data binding button (Database icon) visible on data_table section (bind-data-2)
Data binding button (Database icon) visible on pie_chart section (bind-data-4)
Data binding button (Database icon) visible on line_chart section (bind-data-5)
Clicking data binding button opens 'Bind Live Data' modal
Data binding modal shows 'Select Dataset' label and dropdown (dataset-select)
Data binding modal dropdown shows 'Choose a dataset...' placeholder
Data binding modal has 'Cancel' and 'Apply Binding' buttons
Data table section has 'Show Sparklines' checkbox
Enabling sparklines adds 'Trend' column header to table
Sparklines render as SVG polyline elements (18 found)
All 4 stat cards visible with values: 44%, 32%, 21%, 72%
Bar chart (Revenue by Quarter) section renders correctly with Q1-Q5 bars
Pie chart (Market Share) section renders correctly with legend
Line chart (Growth Trend) section renders correctly

critical_code_review_comments: Minor accessibility: Dialog component missing aria-describedby - consider adding description for screen readers
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 2 features (Live Data Binding and Sparklines) fully verified. Data binding buttons (Database icon) appear on 4 sections: bar_chart, data_table, pie_chart, line_chart. Clicking opens 'Bind Live Data' modal with dataset dropdown. Sparklines work via checkbox on data_table section - adds 'Trend' column with SVG mini charts colored by trend (green=up, red=down). Navigation: Export -> Report Builder.

details.trend_coloring: green for up, red for down
